name: Left 2 Dating
description:
This is a story about a boy and a girl falling in love and dating. What you have to do is help them in different places to have a successful date.



In the beginning, the boy and the girl are not familiar with each other, and you need to take turns controlling one of them to move closer to the other. Be aware that there are ravines and spikes on the road sometimes they need to cross, and you should make sure the boys and girls don't get hurt. They can push boxes to help them get to some hard-to-reach places.



When darkness falls, they are each other's light in the night. You need to carefully control them as they move and explore their way to each other.



After getting through the darkness together, they fall in love and decide to advance and retreat together. You need to control the boy and the girl to move in the same direction at the same time, you need to make sure that they can safely cross the obstacle without getting hurt, and finally meet each other.



Sometimes they have different opinions. You still control both the boy and the girl at the same time, but they will move in opposite directions and you need to make sure they still meet eventually.



More scenarios and challenges are waiting for you in the game.
